text: marayam ke bete eesa ne kaha, "ai allaah, hamaare rab! hamapar aakaash se khaane se bhara khaal utaar, jo hamaare lie aur hamaare angalon aur hamaare pichhalon ke lie khushee ka kaaran bane aur teree or se ek nishaanee ho, aur hamen aahaar pradaan kar. too sabase achchha pradaan karanevaala hai.
